name: Winging It (itch)
description:
You are a neon wireframe bat exploring a mysterious cave. Have fun!

CONTROLS:
Mouse to move, flight sim style
Z to hover in place
Space/click to echolocate

Echolocation lets you see the way, as well as knock down stalactites. Can you find the Cave of the TOJam Goat?

Made for TOJam 11: Don't Stop bEleven with Ksenia Eic (art, 3D modelling) and Jake Butineau (sound, music). Sagan did all the Unity stuff. Original echolocation shader that we modified can be found here!
